ygData.subject: Re: website
ygData.msgSnippet: well... if u guys wanna... i can alwiz create a directory at my web site fer all this crap... but someone gotta do those pages... havent got any tools here...
ygData.messageBody:
well... if u guys wanna... i can alwiz create a directory at my web site fer
all this crap... but someone gotta do those pages... havent got any tools
here... n i dont thnk its a good idea to use pirated software in the
office... so... just send me those files.... n ill upload em to my page...
alternatively... just go geocities n grab one...

----- Original Message -----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 5:39 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] website


> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> Anyone can recommand a place, where I can dump some HTML documents
> related to our mailing list to?
>
> It's easier to find our player list etc...... that way.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Having difficulty getting "in synch" with list members?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Try ONElist's Shared Calendar to organize events, meetings and more!

> Singapore Everquest Players List
